DOC.brief_summary: People eat dietary fiber lower body weight people eat less fiber . Potential mechanism include great feeling satiety , reduction food intake , change blood glucose , insulin , gut hormone . The investigator hypothesize increase dos mixed fiber influence satiety response , food intake , glucose , insulin , ghrelin , GLP-1 , PYY 3-36 , dose-dependent manner , give subject muffins breakfast .
DOC.brief_title: Satiety Response After Mixed Fiber Doses
